master.baggageDescriptionflightFare:
• Hand Baggage  : One hand bag up to {} kgs and 115 cms (L+W+H), shall be allowed per customer. For contactless travel we recommend to place it under the seat in front, on board.
  • Check-in Baggage: {}kg per person ({} piece only).For eligible passengers with ‘6E Double Seat’ or ‘6E Triple Seat’ bookings, an additional 10 kg allowance will be applicable.
master.baggageDetailsDescription:
Hand Baggage : One hand bag up to {} kgs and 115 cms (L+W+H), shall be allowed per customer. For contactless travel we recommend to place it under the seat in front, on board.

Check-in Baggage : {}kg per person  ({} piece only).For eligible passengers with ‘6E Double Seat’ or ‘6E Triple Seat’ bookings, an additional 10 kg allowance will be applicable.

Read all the baggage related information
master.cancellationDetailsDisclaimer:
• Corporate fare: Cancellation fee of INR 100 per passenger, per sector, will be charged if the booking is cancelled 2 hr before the flight departure. No show charges will be levied within 2 hr. Change fee of INR 100 per passenger, per sector, along with applicable fare difference will be charged if modifications are made 2 hr before departure. No change will be permitted within 2 hr of departure.
  • Super 6E: Avail change fee till 4 days beyond departure at ₹500, and within 3 days before departure, at ₹900. Reduced cancellation fee of INR 1500 also offered. *T&C apply. Some services offered are subject to availability. Delayed and Lost Baggage Protection service is powered by Blue Ribbon Bags.
master.deboardingAircraftLabel: Deboarding aircraft may not be allowed
master.departureTimeList: [0-3 (Days left for departure),4 Days left for departure & above]
master.disclaimer:
GST comprises of both Central GST & State GST. For details, kindly refer the tax invoice shared on your email id.

A Non-refundable convenience fee of INR 350 per pax per sector for Domestic and INR 550 per pax per sector for International has been levied on all online payments mode except Credit Shell . For payment in currencies other than INR, refer to the fare breakdown in the price summary.
